# SRTextInputSession.SessionType

**Enumeration**

Methods to input text during a session.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SessionType
```

## Overview

This class defines available options for the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRTextInputSession/sessionType-swift.property] property.

## Sources

- **SRTextInputSession.SessionType.dictation**: Indicates that the session contains spoken text.
- **SRTextInputSession.SessionType.keyboard**: Indicates that the session contains text from keyboard input.
- **SRTextInputSession.SessionType.pencil**: Indicates that the session contains text drawn with Apple Pencil.
- **SRTextInputSession.SessionType.thirdPartyKeyboard**: Indicates that the session contains text from a third-party keyboard.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Inspecting Text Source

- **sessionType**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
